root.name: Need for Speed: V-Rally 2
root.description: Versions Championship Edition (Dreamcast and Playstation) Features: - 16 Tuned Rally cars from World Rally Championship - Tune your car before a race. Example: If it's raining, you can equip 'rain tires' - Over 70 Tracks based on real world locations - Built-in track editor - Local split-screen play (up to 4 players with adapter) Cars: Peugeot 106 Peugeot 206 Peugeot 306 Hyundai Coupe Mitsubishi Lancer Toyota Corolla Subaru Impreza Ford Focus SEAT Cordoba Skoda Octavia Citreon Xsara SEAT Ibiza Renault MeganeOpel Astra Citreon Saxo Nissan March Expert Edition (PC) Features: - 26 Tuned Rally cars from World Rally Championship - Tune your car before a race. Example: If it's raining, you can equip 'rain tires' - 80 Tracks based on real world locations - Built-in track editor - Local split-screen play (up to 4 players with adapter)
